statements: SELECT * FROM RetirementPlans WHERE plan_id = '12345';
SELECT client_id, current_balance FROM RetirementPlans ORDER BY current_balance DESC;
SELECT advisor_id FROM RetirementPlans WHERE retirement_age > 60;
SELECT client_id, advisor_id, contribution_amount FROM RetirementPlans WHERE current_balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM RetirementPlans WHERE advisor_id IN ('A123', 'B456', 'C789');
SELECT * FROM RetirementPlans WHERE advisor_id = 'ADV123' AND retirement_age > 65 ORDER BY current_balance DESC
SELECT client_id, current_balance FROM RetirementPlans WHERE contribution_amount >= 5000
SELECT advisor_id, client_id, retirement_age FROM RetirementPlans WHERE client_id = 'CLI456'
SELECT advisor_id, retirement_age, current_balance FROM RetirementPlans WHERE retirement_age BETWEEN 60 AND 70
SELECT * FROM RetirementPlans WHERE retirement_age < 60 OR contribution_amount < 2500
SELECT id, name, location FROM financial_advisors;
SELECT name, id FROM financial_advisors;
SELECT id, name, advisor_id, retirement_plan FROM clients;
SELECT advisor_id, name, retirement_plan FROM clients;
SELECT name, location FROM financial_advisors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_advisors WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM clients WHERE advisor_id = 101 ORDER BY name;
SELECT advisor_id, COUNT(id) AS total_clients FROM clients GROUP BY advisor_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_advisors fa JOIN clients c ON fa.id = c.advisor_id WHERE fa.location = 'California';
SELECT fa.name AS advisor_name, c.name AS client_name, c.retirement_plan FROM financial_advisors fa LEFT JOIN clients c ON fa.id = c.advisor_id WHERE c.retirement_plan = '401k';
SELECT * FROM FinancialAdvisors;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM FinancialAdvisors;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM FinancialAdvisors WHERE advisor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RetirementPlans WHERE plan_status = 'active';
SELECT advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_email FROM FinancialAdvisors;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients WHERE advisor_id = 1 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, plan_details, plan_status FROM Clients c JOIN RetirementPlans r ON c.client_id = r.client_id WHERE c.client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, COUNT(c.client_id) AS total_clients FROM FinancialAdvisors f LEFT JOIN Clients c ON f.advisor_id = c.advisor_id GROUP BY advisor_name HAVING total_clients > 3;

SELECT client_name, plan_details, CASE WHEN plan_status = 'active' THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS plan_status_updated FROM Clients c JOIN RetirementPlans r ON c.client_id = r.client_id WHERE r.plan_status = 'active'
SELECT * FROM financial_advisors;
SELECT advisor_name, service_type FROM financial_advisors ORDER BY service_type ASC;
SELECT client_name, age FROM clients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT advisor_name, years_of_experience FROM financial_advisors WHERE years_of_experience >= 5;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM retirement_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_advisors ORDER BY advisor_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY client_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT advisor_name, service_type FROM financial_advisors JOIN clients ON financial_advisors.advisor_id = clients.client_id WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY advisor_name ASC, client_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM retirement_plans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY plan_id DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT clients.client_name, retirement_plans.plan_name FROM clients JOIN adjustments ON clients.client_id = adjustments.client_id JOIN retirement_plans ON adjustments.plan_id = retirement_plans.plan_id ORDER BY clients.client_name ASC, retirement_plans.plan_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM FinancialAdvisors;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM FinancialAdvisors;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_age FROM Clients WHERE client_age > 40;
SELECT plan_name, advisor_name FROM RetirementPlans INNER JOIN FinancialAdvisors ON FinancialAdvisors.advisor_id = RetirementPlans.advisor_id;

SELECT plan_name, circumstance_description, adjustment_amount FROM RetirementPlans JOIN Adjustments ON RetirementPlans.plan_id = Adjustments.plan_id JOIN Circumstances ON Adjustments.circumstance_id = Circumstances.circumstance_id WHERE adjustment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FinancialAdvisors
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM FinancialAdvisors WHERE advisor_id = 1
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_age FROM Clients WHERE client_age > 60

SELECT plan_name, advisor_name, adjustment_amount FROM RetirementPlans JOIN FinancialAdvisors ON FinancialAdvisors.advisor_id = RetirementPlans.advisor_id JOIN Adjustments ON RetirementPlans.plan_id = Adjustments.plan_id
SELECT * FROM Circumstances WHERE circumstance_description LIKE '%retirement%'
